University Downtown Center Inbound

Description:

The University Downtown Center Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center enroute to campus.


Reminder: All Inbound buses at the University Downtown Center return to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:30 A.M. to 8:15 P.M.


Weekends:
On Weekends the UDC Inbound does not run.

For service to Binghamton University please take the Westside Inbound or the Downtown Center-Leroy Inbound.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the University Downtown Center Inbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

② Arrives at the University Union
